headline: CMB International Securities Maintains Buy Rating on ServiceNow (NOW) Stock
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Best Fundamentally Strong Stocks to Buy. On October 31, Saiyi He, an analyst from CMB International Securities, maintained a “Buy” rating on the company’s stock, and the associated price target was $1,180.00. The analyst’s rating is backed by a combination of factors, which include its impressive financial performance and […]
